column4: So nobody here runs testing? Or nobody runs something else then english as the language?

what do you mean?
read the link

is that one your card

mint's not supported here

the same happens when you mention ubuntu on #debian. everybody goes crazy... i use many OSes on my machines. so its hard to avoid mentioning that.
